text: This is a list of prime ministers of Madagascar, since the creation of the office of Chief Minister in 1828, during the Merina Kingdom. ==List== Portrait Name Term of office Political party Monarch(s) Took office Left office Time in office Merina Kingdom 1 Andriamihaja 1828 1833 years Independent Ranavalona I 2 Rainiharo 1833 1852 years Independent Ranavalona I 3 Rainivoninahitriniony
